author: sky.cactus
content: It is still a function of not being included due to slow propagation, however the calculus has changed.  Since there is no block reward it is technically a function of reward from fees from the block without your transaction.

author: pietjepuk
content: There is still a proposer reward though, albeit lower (0.03 ETH or something). And timing is a bit different as well, given the 4 second window (and boost scoring). You don't, at least not always, have to worry about being as fast as possible.

author: sky.cactus
content: The risk comes from a combination of not being able to wait as long to see if better transactions (more fees) become available, and of increased risk of a network hiccup delaying your block sufficiently to get excluded.
